markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Dhuthorex](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=283)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 80

Strange things swim in sunless seas, but few as fierce as the shark-like dhuthorexes. These beasts chase prey fearlessly and tenaciously.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Deepwater Dhuthorex](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1382) (Creature 9), [Dread Dhuthorex](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1383) (Creature 11)
name: Dhuthorex
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 80
